name: HatStones.
description:
You are a cowboy, with a color changing hat, in an odd stone structure.

Your key back up is on the way down.

This is my submission to the 2020 Unreal jam.

Thanks to Brendan for helping me record gameplay and submit the project 1 minute before the deadline.

---------------------------------------------------------------

WASD to run

SPACE to jump

ARROWS to move the camera

R to interact with hatstones

ESC to pause

Plays great with a controller! I would recommend plugging one in to the computer.

---------------------------------------------------------------

by James Cannizzaro
